content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to use the `execute_shell` command to browse the Go To Brno website, but it returned an error. I then used the `browse_website` command to navigate to the website, but it did not provide the information I needed. I then used the `web_search` command to search for information on the Brno Reservoir trail and the educational trail with six ecologically focused stations. The `web_search` command returned a list of URLs from the Go To Brno website with information on the trails. The Brno Reservoir trail is a 5.4-mile out-and-back trail that takes an average of 2 h 14 min to complete. The educational trail has six ecologically focused stations and is a 3-kilometre walk with a rise of 140 metres. The forest stands of Deer Glen with mighty oaks and 200-year-old beeches has been a nature reserve since 1979.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.gotobrno.cz/en/place/deer-glen/", "question": "information about Deer Glen nature reserve and the educational trail with six ecologically focused stations"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a website for tourism in Brno, Czech Republic. It includes information on events, food and drink, places to visit, and useful information for tourists. However, there is no information about Deer Glen nature reserve and the educational trail with six ecologically focused stations.\n\nLinks: ['Manage options (https://www.gotobrno.cz/en/terms-and-conditions-for-use-of-the-gotobrno-cz-portal/#cmplz-manage-consent-container)', 'Manage services (https://www.gotobrno.cz/en/terms-and-conditions-for-use-of-the-gotobrno-cz-portal/#cmplz-cookies-overview)', 'Manage vendors (https://www.gotobrno.cz/en/terms-and-conditions-for-use-of-the-gotobrno-cz-portal/#cmplz-tcf-wrapper)', 'Read more about these purposes (https://cookiedatabase.org/tcf/purposes/)', 'Nastaven√≠ (https://www.gotobrno.cz/en/terms-and-conditions-for-use-of-the-gotobrno-cz-portal/#cmplz-manage-consent-container)']", type='action_result')]
"""
